text: Bent Viscaal (born 18 September 1999 in Albergen) is a racing driver from the Netherlands. He currently competes in the FIA Formula 3 Championship with MP Motorsport having previously raced with HWA Racelab in 2019. ==Career results== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 90%; text-align:center" |- !
